SELECT A.AUC_OBJ_DSC /* 경매대상구분 */ , A.AUC_PRG_SQ /* 경매진행순서 */ , SUBSTR(SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, -5),1,4) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO_BARCODE /* 축산개체관리번호(바코드, 귀표번호) */ , SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 4, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO, 7, 9) AS SRA_INDV_AMNNO , E.INDV_SEX_C /* 개체성별코드 */ , A.FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM /* 최초최저낙찰한도금액 */ , A.SRA_SBID_AM /* 축산낙찰금액 */ , A.SRA_SBID_UPR /* 축산낙찰금액 */ , CASE WHEN B.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO = '23' THEN '유찰' ELSE B.LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO END AS LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO /* 낙찰번호(참여자번호) */ , CASE WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_MWMNNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_MWMNNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_MWMNNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(C.SRA_MWMNNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(C.SRA_MWMNNM,5,1) END AS SRA_MWMNNM /* 중도매인명 */ , CASE WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,1) || '*' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,3,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) = 4 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,1) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,4,1) WHEN LENGTH(D.FTSNM) >= 5 THEN SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,1,2) || '**' || SUBSTR(D.FTSNM,5,1) END AS FTSNM /* 농가명 */ , D.DONGUP ||' '|| TRIM(LPAD(' ', LENGTH(D.DONGBW) +1, '*')) AS DONG /* 농가주소 */ , CASE WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 9 THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),6,4) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) = 10 THEN (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) = '02' THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,2) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) ELSE SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-***-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),7,4) END) WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-','')) IN(11,12) THEN SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),1,3) || '-****-' || SUBSTR(REPLACE(D.CUS_MPNO,'-',''),8,4) END AS CUS_MPNO /* 농가핸드폰번호 */ , CASE WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '1' AND CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 10000 THEN '만원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '1' AND CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1000 THEN '천원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '1' AND CALF_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1 THEN '원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '2' AND NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 10000 THEN '만원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '2' AND NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1000 THEN '천원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '2' AND NBFCT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1 THEN '원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '3' AND PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 10000 THEN '만원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '3' AND PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1000 THEN '천원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '3' AND PPGCOW_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1 THEN '원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '5' AND GT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 10000 THEN '만원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '5' AND GT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1000 THEN '천원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '5' AND GT_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1 THEN '원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '6' AND HS_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 10000 THEN '만원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '6' AND HS_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1000 THEN '천원' WHEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = '6' AND HS_AUC_ATDR_UNT_AM = 1 THEN '원' END AS PRICE_UNIT FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_ENTR B ON A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.AUC_DT = B.AUC_DT AND A.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO AND B.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN B.AUC_OBJ_DSC ='0' THEN B.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE A.AUC_OBJ_DSC END LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_MWMN C ON C.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND C.TRMN_AMNNO = B.TRMN_AMNNO LEFT JOIN TB_LA_IS_MM_ENV_EST F ON A.NA_BZPLC = F.NA_BZPLC , TB_LA_IS_MM_FHS D , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV E WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc}
AND ( (#{auc_obj_dsc} = '0' AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC IN ('0', '1', '2', '3')) OR (#{auc_obj_dsc} != '0' AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = #{auc_obj_dsc}) ) AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.DEL_YN = '0' AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = NVL(#{sra_srs_dsc}, A.SRA_SRS_DSC) AND (A.SEL_STS_DSC = #{sel_sts_dsc} OR #{sel_sts_dsc} is null) AND A.LED_SQNO = '1' AND (A.AUC_PRG_SQ >= #{st_auc_no} OR #{st_auc_no} is null) AND (A.AUC_PRG_SQ <= #{ed_auc_no} OR #{ed_auc_no} is null) AND A.NA_BZPLC = E.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = E.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = E.SRA_SRS_DSC AND (A.DDL_QCN = #{ddl_qcn} OR #{ddl_qcn} is null) AND D.NA_BZPLC = A.NA_BZPLC AND D.FHS_ID_NO = A.FHS_ID_NO AND D.FARM_AMNNO = A.FARM_AMNNO ORDER BY A.AUC_PRG_SQ
